Description: Fully remodeled ground level condo in the highly sought-after Heather Ridge community and Cherry Creek school district! Just minutes to Denver RTD rail system that operates 365 days a year! Showings start Friday.

This unique, fully remodeled 1124 sq ft sturdy ranch home features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and two workshops. Every surface of this home has been touched during this architect-designed renovation. The open concept living room opens to the gourmet kitchen with soft-close cabinets, top-line stainless LG smart appliances, gas range, pot-filler, oversized farm sink, leathered porcelain counters and six-foot center island with quartzite slab. Dining room features tongue and groove wood ceiling with cove lighting and hidden-storage seating. From the dining room, a sliding glass door opens to a spacious patio looking out to the backyard and mountains. The original oak floors were refinished. Wi-fi connected dimming light switches, appliances, Nest thermostat, smoke/Co2 detectors. USB B-C adapters integrated in many wall outlets. Ring alarm system with exterior lights/cameras. All new wiring and electric with energy efficient soft LED recessed fixtures and accent lighting features. Ceiling fans in all bedrooms. New furnace with central A/C. All plumbing replaced and new sewer line. Custom tile work in kitchen & bathrooms. Powered anti-fog backlit vanity mirrors in both bathrooms. Two sun-tunnels fill interior spaces with natural light. New HE windows and patio doors and new roof. Convenient 144 sq foot downstairs storage area just off kitchen. New LG wash-tower. The workshop has new utility connections and is ready to be finished, with new roof and stucco exterior to match the house.

This stunning 1970’s Pine Valley home has been professionally updated with no detail spared. This is not a fix and flip. There is a wet bar or second kitchen for future mother in law space, large bedroom, updated bathroom with walk in shower. Upstairs you will find a true primary bedroom with a stunning 5 piece ensuite, heavenly soaking tub and two closets, one that is walk in. There are two additional large bedrooms, a fully remodeled bathroom, utility room and storage. The owners have gone above and beyond in installing systems including a brand new roof, new gutters, two furnaces and two ac units as well as a tankless hot water heater. They have also had the home professionally painted, new doors and a new garage door installed. The yard has a brand new concrete patio poured, newer pergola and a storage shed. The owners paid in full for the solar which will be a huge savings to the next buyer.  It dots the i’s and crosses the t’s of any buyers wish list by finishing up with a large two car garage. The home is walking distance to George Wallace Park and minutes to Belleview Square Shopping Center, Cherry Creek State Park and the Denver Tech Center.

Close to shopping. An amazing house in the heart of Denver. Come see for yourself.

Stunning 1940's brick ranch, remodeled in 2018, and located in the Montclair neighborhood of Denver! As you enter, hardwood floors greet your feet & flow throughout the main floor. The main level floor plan has been opened up with the addition of structural beams during the remodel. The uniquely designed full bathroom features black & white decorative floor tile, black marble countertops, and completes the main floor. The basement holds the master suite, auxiliary bedroom, laundry room, and utility closet. The spacious master suite includes an open sitting area with gas fireplace, a 5-piece master bathroom, and a walk-in closet with built-in folding table. The master bathroom welcomes you with striking Carrara marble countertops, tile floors, and tile half wall. The shower stall includes a pebble floor, bench, glass door, and marble tile surround. Both basement bedrooms feature solid-core doors & carpeted floors. The large laundry room has wood-look laminate floors, granite countertops, utility sink, and soft-close cabinetry. The backyard includes a stamped concrete patio, new fencing, storage shed, professional landscaping, and an oversized 2-car garage that includes a 2nd fridge & built-in shelving. Less than a mile to grocery, banking, brewery, restaurants, and Montclair Park with tennis courts, horseshoe pits, and more. 2 miles to City Park, Denver Zoo, the Museum of Nature & Science, and Lowry Plaza. Welcome Home!

Custom landscaping, retaining walls (which haven't moved an inch!). Bring your most discerning buyer to this palatial masterpiece! Impossible to list all the phenomenal features!
